## Conversion.ObjectConverter.convertPartial() method

Converts the supplied object using the [ObjectConverter](./ts-utils.conversion.objectconverter.md) with all fields optional.

**Signature:**

```typescript
convertPartial(from: unknown, context?: TC): Result<Partial<T>>;
```

The object to be converted.


</td></tr>

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ An optional context object passed to the field converters.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Result](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->&lt;Partial&lt;T&gt;&gt;

A [Result](./ts-utils.result.md) containing the converted object or an error message.
